meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by flaking or scaling
meanings.sent1: My brother has pityriasis, which causes his skin to flake.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with pityriasis due to the excessive scaling of her skin.
meanings.sent3: The pityriasis on his arms made it look like he had snowflakes falling from his skin.
meanings.sent4: Her pityriasis was like a tiny blizzard on her shoulders, leaving a trail of flakes wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The pityriasis on his face was so noticeable, it seemed like a layer of snow on his skin.

meanings.definition: The medical term for dandruff or seborrheic dermatitis
meanings.sent1: She tried different shampoos to treat her pityriasis, also known as dandruff.
meanings.sent2: Pityriasis is a common issue that many people face, especially during winter.
meanings.sent3: The pityriasis on his scalp made him look like he had a dusting of snow on his head.
meanings.sent4: Her pityriasis was like a persistent snowfall, always present no matter what she did.
meanings.sent5: The pityriasis on his hair was so visible, it seemed like tiny snowflakes clinging to each strand.
